title: Bg. 1.27
sanskrit: तान्समीक्ष्य स कौन्तेयः सर्वान्बन्धूनवस्थितान्  ।कृपया परयाविष्टो विषीदन्निदमब्रवीत् ॥ २७ ॥
transliteration: tān samīkṣya sa kaunteyaḥsarvān bandhūn avasthitānkṛpayā parayāviṣṭoviṣīdann idam abravīt
literary_trans: When the son of Kuntī, Arjuna, saw all these different grades of friends and relatives, he became overwhelmed with compassion and spoke thus.When the son of Kuntī, Arjuna, saw all these different grades of friends and relatives, he became overwhelmed with compassion and spoke thus.
